source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Stormstrike, Lava Lash and Doom Winds by 5%, up to 25%. Maelstrom Weapon spenders have a 1.0% chance to remove Winning Streak! per Maelstrom Weapon spent.

Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! the winds shift into Doom Winds for 3 sec. When Doom Winds deal damage, your next Crash Lightning deals 12.0% increased damage, up to 60.0%. This effect can be stored up to 10 stacks. Additionally, Crash Lightning deals 75% more damage to your main target.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Helm of the Awakened Soul

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 72 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging abilities have a very high chance to charge the magnet, up to 30 times.

Use: Reverse the magnet's polarity to violently recycle buried garbage, dealing 82,171 Plague damage to your target per charge. Lingering virulence deals 10% of the damage dealt to 5 nearby enemies over 6 sec. (20 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 783,573 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,692 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
The Fist of Ra-den

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 356,476 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 99,022 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
